Title: Successful user registration with valid details
Description: Verify that a new user can register with a valid email, password (>=8 chars), and name, and receives a 201 Created response with profile data (excluding password).
Acceptance Criteria: Given valid user details (email, password, name), the system creates a new user account successfully.
System returns 201 Created status with user profile data (excluding password) on successful registration.
Password is encrypted using BCrypt before storing in database.

Title: Registration fails for already registered email
Description: Verify that attempting to register with an email that already exists returns a 400 error with the message 'Email already exists'.
Acceptance Criteria: Given an already registered email, the system returns a 400 error with message 'Email already exists'.

Title: Registration fails for invalid email format
Description: Verify that attempting to register with an invalid email format returns a 400 error with a validation message.
Acceptance Criteria: Given invalid email format, the system returns a 400 error with validation message.

Title: Registration fails for password less than 8 characters
Description: Verify that attempting to register with a password shorter than 8 characters returns a 400 error with the message 'Password must be at least 8 characters'.
Acceptance Criteria: Given password less than 8 characters, the system returns a 400 error with message 'Password must be at least 8 characters'.

Title: Password is not returned in registration response
Description: Ensure that the password field is not present in the response body when registration is successful.
Acceptance Criteria: System returns 201 Created status with user profile data (excluding password) on successful registration.

Title: Boundary: Registration with password exactly 8 characters
Description: Verify that registration succeeds when the password is exactly 8 characters long.
Acceptance Criteria: Given valid user details with an 8-character password, the system creates a new user account successfully.

Title: Negative: Registration with missing required fields
Description: Verify that registration fails with appropriate error messages when required fields (email, password, or name) are missing.
Acceptance Criteria: System returns a 400 error with validation messages when any required field is missing.

Title: Negative: Registration with empty string values
Description: Verify that registration fails with appropriate error messages when required fields are provided as empty strings.
Acceptance Criteria: System returns a 400 error with validation messages when required fields are empty.

Title: Negative: Registration with password containing only spaces
Description: Verify that registration fails when the password consists only of whitespace characters.
Acceptance Criteria: System returns a 400 error with validation message for invalid password.

Title: Edge: Registration with long but valid email and name
Description: Verify that registration succeeds with a very long but valid email and name (within system limits).
Acceptance Criteria: Given valid but long email and name, the system creates a new user account successfully.
